metadata.title: CVE-2020-36766 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.6.drivers/media/cec/core/cec-api.c leaks one byte of kernel memory onspecific hardware to unprivileged users, because of directly assigninglog_addrs with a hole in the struct.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
